typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string
}
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
